snippet: The American Express Platinum Card will no longer give cardholders free access to the airport lounges of the merged US Airways and American Airlines.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column; American Express Platinum Card will no longer give cardholders free access to the airport lounges of the merged US Airways and American Airlines; points out that for banks and their airline partners, stakes are very high in hardball financial competition.
lead_paragraph: The American Express Platinum Card will no longer give cardholders free access to the airport lounges of the merged US Airways and American Airlines.
